titleStmt.title: A letter from His Excellency, the Heer van Horne to the high and mighty lords, the States Generall of the United Provinces, from on board the Hollandia sailing off of Nermontier wherein is given a true accomtp [sic] of the actions of the Dutch fleet upon the coasts of France, as also of their landing in diverse places on the said coasts / faithfully translated out of the Dutch copy.
titleStmt.author: Hornes, Willem Adriaan, graaf van, d. 1694.
